-- ============================================
-- TC-05: Dashboard Widgets
-- ============================================
-- Preparation: create and execute a sampling job first
-- (use tc-04 datagen table or create a new one)
--
-- STEP 1: Go to Dashboard > New Widget
--   Expand the job, select 'Sampler'
--   EXPECTED: preview widget shows samples
--
-- STEP 2: Set widget name to 'Sampler widget'
--   EXPECTED: name shows on preview header
--
-- STEP 3: Turn on pagination in Data Grid section
--   EXPECTED: pagination footer appears
--
-- STEP 4: Click Create
--   EXPECTED: widget appears on dashboard
--
-- STEP 5: Drag widget to different column
--   EXPECTED: snaps to nearest column
--
-- STEP 6: Resize widget using bottom-right handle
--   EXPECTED: resizes and snaps to grid
--
-- STEP 7: Pause auto-update
--   EXPECTED: warning icon, updates stop
--
-- STEP 8: Resume auto-update
--   EXPECTED: updates restart
--
-- STEP 9: Edit widget > verify data source highlighted
-- STEP 10: Verify pagination is on in Data Grid
-- STEP 11: Click Back to close wizard
--
-- STEP 12: Maximize widget (three-dot menu)
--   EXPECTED: takes full width/height
--
-- STEP 13: Restore widget
--   EXPECTED: original size/position
--
-- STEP 14: Stop the sampling job, go to dashboard
--   EXPECTED: error message on widget
--
-- STEP 15: Click 'Go to Job' link on error
--   EXPECTED: redirected to job workspace
--
-- STEP 16: Delete job, go to dashboard
--   EXPECTED: error - job not found
--
-- STEP 17: Enter full-screen mode
--   EXPECTED: notification, gridster fills viewport
--
-- STEP 18: Press ESC
--   EXPECTED: header reappears
--
-- STEP 19: Refresh page
--   EXPECTED: widgets reload with same sizes/positions
--
-- STEP 20: Switch to new project > Dashboard
--   EXPECTED: dashboard is empty
--
-- STEP 21: Switch back > Dashboard
--   EXPECTED: widgets reloaded
--
-- STEP 22: Remove widget via three-dot menu
--   EXPECTED: widget removed
--
-- STEP 23: Reload page
--   EXPECTED: widget not loaded
-- ============================================
SELECT 'See comments above for dashboard UI test steps' AS instructions;
